headline: Is D.R. Horton Offering Value After 12.8% Surge Amid Housing Market Optimism?
summary: If you’re staring at D.R. Horton’s stock price and wondering whether now is the moment to buy, hold, or sidestep, you’re not alone. The stock market has made many investors recalibrate lately, and D.R. Horton, one of the biggest names in homebuilding, is no exception. Over the past month, the stock jumped 12.8%, shaking off short-term jitters and signaling renewed optimism in the housing market. However, looking at a one-year view, shares are actually down 9.2%. This contrast suggests either...
